Uses of Package
org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat

  • Packages that use org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web.embedded
    Configuration for embedded reactive and servlet web servers.
    org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web.reactive
    Auto-configuration for reactive web servers and Spring WebFlux.
    org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web.servlet
    Auto-configuration for servlet web servers and Spring MVC.
    org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.websocket.reactive
    Auto-configuration for WebSocket support in reactive web servers.
    org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.websocket.servlet
    Auto-configuration for WebSocket support in servlet web servers.
    org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat
    Embedded reactive and servlet web server implementations backed by Tomcat.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat used by org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web.embedded 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurableTomcatWebServerFactory
    ConfigurableWebServerFactory for Tomcat-specific features.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat used by org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web.reactive 
    Class and Description
    TomcatReactiveWebServerFactory
    ReactiveWebServerFactory that can be used to create a TomcatWebServer.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat used by org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web.servlet 
    Class and Description
    TomcatServletWebServerFactory
    AbstractServletWebServerFactory that can be used to create TomcatWebServers.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat used by org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.websocket.reactive 
    Class and Description
    TomcatReactiveWebServerFactory
    ReactiveWebServerFactory that can be used to create a TomcatWebServer.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat used by org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.websocket.servlet 
    Class and Description
    TomcatServletWebServerFactory
    AbstractServletWebServerFactory that can be used to create TomcatWebServers.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat used by org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurableTomcatWebServerFactory
    ConfigurableWebServerFactory for Tomcat-specific features.
    TomcatConnectorCustomizer
    Callback interface that can be used to customize a Tomcat Connector.
    TomcatContextCustomizer
    Callback interface that can be used to customize a Tomcat Context.
    TomcatProtocolHandlerCustomizer
    Callback interface that can be used to customize the ProtocolHandler on the Connector.
    TomcatWebServer
    WebServer that can be used to control a Tomcat web server.
